content: this is a no-fuss top-down raglan cardigan with small rib details around the edges it has a minimum of an a-line to improve the fit over bust and hip the neck is classic round and wide with a great fit over the shoulders and the back the choice of yarn including my favorite qualities as linen alpaca and silk along with the feel and colour led to the name of the pattern the pattern includes instructions for knitting sleeves in pieces or in the round the choice is yours
